item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m SUMIT ðŸ‘‹ Link to heading Welcome to my corner of the internet Link to heading Years ago I started my privacy journey after discovering how invasive companies are and how much spyware we use in our everyday lives. I made it my goal to become as private as possible, and that has led me to learning things like Linux, Monero, security, and self-hosting. I believe in freedom. Freedom of speech, freedom of ideas, freedom of communication, and freedom of transacting.
